answers.answer: I had that and Lyrica 75mg tds seems to ease the problem just fine. It is part of diabetic neuropathy. Lyrica is used for neuro end type of pains. It is a prescribed drug and can be used chronically. Side effect I had was slight pick up of weight not too much likely...
Is there a question somewhere in your post? What are doing to control and manage your diabetes?

question: I am Diabetic and woken at night by very severe stinging darts of pain in my foot
